name: mernboot
description: A powerful CLI tool for generating full-stack MERN applications with automated MongoDB Atlas setup, pre-configured Express backend, and React frontend with Tailwind CSS. Features include automated database configuration, project structure setup, and development environment configuration.
author: Theja Ashwin

scripts.postinstall:
node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const pkgPath=path.join(process.env.INIT_CWD,'package.json');if(fs.existsSync(pkgPath)){const pkg=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(pkgPath));pkg.scripts=pkg.scripts||{};pkg.scripts.mernboot='boot';fs.writeFileSync(pkgPath,JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2));}console.log('
